content:
I am presuming you mean SR? 

Yeah it is a constantly evolving understanding. The underlying phenomenon was a light-switch click and has never changed, but how I communicate and understand various things has and will evolve over time. When I say things like "you don't experience anxiety or nightmares" that is absolutely permanent, hasn't changed, and I don't see why it would ever change, but the manner of how I speak about things definitely will/has and hopefully is more particular/accurate over time in order to help others get it too. There are also just aspects like long term relationships or having kids that I just don't know about because I haven't experienced them and I can't currently speak on, so thats another thing as well. When I am 50 I will almost definitely just be talking about the same thing, but in a different way that suits whatever is happening then.
